message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $14000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $13000 for the product. Can you consider that?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $13500. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $13000 for the product. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price.
